titles.title: A bill for the relief of Merrill L. Johnson-Lannen.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-874.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/18/1988--Introduced. Deems a named individual to be an employee whose transfer from the United States Postal Service to the United States Army Corps of Engineers entitled him to travel, transportation, and relocation expenses.
